articles.title: Robert Blake, Actor Acquitted in Wife's Killing, Dies at 89 - The Epoch Times
articles.description: LOS ANGELES—Robert Blake, the Emmy award-winning performer who went from acclaim for his acting to notoriety when he was tried and acquitted in the killing of his wife, died Thursday at age 89. A statement released on behalf of his niece, Noreen Austin, said …
